definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: From the table-top, the lace coverings.
sentences.chinese: 桌面上，沒有了花邊檯布。

sentences.english: A cloth had been spread over a little round table on which was a vase of fragrant plum blossom.
sentences.chinese: 小圓桌鋪上了檯布，添了瓶盛開的臘梅，吐着幽香。

sentences.english: Your job is to stiffen linen with starch .
sentences.chinese: 你的工作是把亞麻檯布漿洗硬了。

sentences.english: Please have a look at the hand embroidered one with a new design of bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 請看這塊手繡的有新式竹子圖案的檯布。

sentences.english: I want to buy some embroidered tablecloths.
sentences.chinese: 我想買一些刺繡的檯布。

sentences.english: Table cloth and skirting must be well pressed without any stain and holes.
sentences.chinese: 檯布和臺裙必須無破損無污漬且平整。

sentences.english: At the moment the cause of her concern was a pile of soiled tablecloths .
sentences.chinese: 此刻她關心的事是一堆弄髒了的檯布。

sentences.english: The tablecloths made in your province have a ready market in our country.
sentences.chinese: 你省所產的檯布在我國市場上暢銷。

sentences.english: Our tablecloth is modestly priced and quite sellable in your market.
sentences.chinese: 我們的檯布價格優惠，在貴方市場上非常好賣。

sentences.english: The milk spilled on the tablecloth.
On a table with a green cover lay a number of open books.
sentences.chinese: 一張鋪著綠色檯布的桌子上放著幾本掀開的書。

sentences.english: We can also make tablecloths according to the patterns you give us.
sentences.chinese: 我們也可以根據你們提供的花樣製作檯布。

sentences.english: The tablecloth trails on the floor.
There\’s a cloth over the table.
As been well - known, our tablecloth is exquisitely made and moderately priced.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，我們的檯布做工精緻，價格公道。
